title: Formation of intraneuronal iron deposits following local release from nanostructured silica injected into rat brain parenchyma
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): E. Ortiz-Islas, A.A. Ponce-Juárez, F. Tzompantzi-Morales, M.E. Manríquez-Ramírez, C. Rubio, M. Calvillo-Velasco, G. Chávez-Cortes, F. Missirlis, M. Rubio-Osornio
